title: installing firefox

I don't like bing. firefox does better more concrete searching not all over the place. How can I install from firefox website and it does not go to microsoft.
creator: lagace4206

title: Help Needed with Display Issues for Pokémon Infinite Fusion Site on Firefox
content:
Hello Mozilla Support,

I am encountering display issues with my WordPress website, which is dedicated to a fan-made game called Pokémon Infinite Fusion. The site appears to load correctly on other browsers like Chrome and Edge, but certain elements are not displaying properly on Firefox.

Website Details: 

   Main URL: Pokémon Infinite Fusion    Specific Pages with Issues:        Pokémon Infinite Fusion Sprite Installer        Pokémon Infinite Fusion Calculator

What I Tried: 

   CSS and JavaScript Debugging: Checked and validated CSS and JavaScript for compatibility issues.    Browser Cache Clearing: Cleared the cache and cookies in Firefox to ensure it wasn’t a caching issue.    Add-ons Disabled: Ran Firefox in Safe Mode with all add-ons disabled to see if any extensions were causing the issue.    Responsive Design Mode: Used Firefox's Responsive Design Mode to check how the site renders on different screen sizes.    Error Console: Reviewed the Error Console in Firefox to identify any specific errors or warnings.

What I Expected:

I expected that the website would display consistently across all browsers, including Firefox.

What Actually Happened:

Despite my efforts, certain elements on the site, such as images and interactive features, still do not display correctly on Firefox. These issues are not present on other browsers, which suggests a compatibility problem specific to Firefox.

Questions: 

   Are there any known compatibility issues between Firefox and certain WordPress themes or plugins that might cause this problem?    Could there be specific CSS or JavaScript practices that work in other browsers but not in Firefox?    Are there additional tools or techniques in Firefox that I can use to diagnose and fix these display issues?

I would appreciate any advice or suggestions on how to resolve these display issues. Ensuring a consistent user experience across all browsers is important for my website.

Thank you in advance for your assistance!

Best regards, Saimhbx
creator: saimhasan359

title: Win.Trojan.Spora-7724442-0
content:
Good morning from London, UK,

Recently became unable to update Spybot and Malwarebytes. Ran Windows Defender which didn't find anything but when I run ClamWinPortable, it produced and moved the file to quarantine. This makes Firefox unusable. Reinstalled Firefox via another browser and the same thing happens. Do you have any suggestions please?

C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\xul.dll: Win.Trojan.Spora-7724442-0 FOUND

title: I can't open uwyo.edu website on mac firefox
content:
Hello,

I cannot open the uwyo.edu website on my Firefox browser. I have no problems with other browsers. I tried and checked the solutions people shared, but none of them worked for me. I checked the DNS and different networks, and I also checked the link below:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-cant-load-websites-other-browsers-can

I would appreciate it if you could help.

Thank you and best regards, Farshad

title: View-only mode for a webpage (not Reader Mode)
content:
This is not a bug or issue, rather a use case question. I have a webpage with information and I don't want to accidentally click or submit anything on the page.

This could also be considering having a form etc in draft form as view-only so you go into "View Only Mode" and work the webpage as a reference etc. without having to worry about any accidental submission or mistakes.

If someone knows of Add-ons or how we can achieve it with FF, it would be much appreciated. Posting, since I expect to have this case often.
creator: abhijnvb

title: No middle-click navigation
content: Hi, it has been a while that one of the updates on firefox removed the ability to navigate using the middle click, i waited and waited for some day an update drop and fix that but it's been a while and nothing has come, i was sure to test this on another computer and it didn't worked as well so i'm pretty sure firefox has some problems, i mainly use a drawing tablet because i don't have a mouse, so navigating is a bit hard without the usual middle click nagivation(i'm not sure if there is an actual name to that), please help
